'''''Forest of Jnana and Vidya''''' is the fourteenth original [[soundtrack]] album to be released for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''. It serves as the [[Sumeru]] Chapter soundtrack album.

It features a total of 100 tracks produced by the [[HOYO-MiX]] team. The album is divided into four discs: ''Dwelling Where Everlasting Spring Abides''; ''Woods, Rivers and Mysteries''; ''Eternal Antagonism Between Life and Death''; and ''Battles of Sumeru''. Selected pieces were performed by the London Symphony Orchestra and guest folk artists, and were recorded at Abbey Road Studios, Redfort Studio, Air-Edel Recording Studios, Smecky Music Studio, and Jintian Recording Studio.

The album was first announced on September 16, 2022, during the [[Special Program]] for [[Version 3.1]]. The tracklist was announced on October 18 and the album was later released on October 20.<ref>Weixin: [https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/DB-WDlC1T0sAItrGVGpI_Q 《原神》须弥篇OST即将上线]</ref>
